meanings.definition: Having the flavor or aroma of nutmeg.
meanings.sent1: The nutmeggy pie filled the kitchen with a warm, spicy scent.
meanings.sent2: The nutmeggy cookies were a hit at the bake sale.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her nutmeggy perfume could double as a holiday air freshener.
meanings.sent4: The cozy cabin smelled nutmeggy, like a hug from grandma.
meanings.sent5: The nutmeggy tea was so comforting on a chilly evening.

meanings.sent1: The nutmeggy color of the walls gave the room a cozy feel.
meanings.sent2: The nutmeggy wood of the table matched the rustic decor perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The nutmeggy pattern on the curtains reminded her of fall leaves.
meanings.sent4: The nutmeggy swirls in the marble countertop added elegance to the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The nutmeggy carpet made the room feel warm and inviting.

meanings.definition: Characterized by the taste or smell of nutmeg.
meanings.sent1: The nutmeggy soup warmed her up on a cold winter day.
meanings.sent2: The nutmeggy aroma of the stew filled the house with a comforting scent.
meanings.sent3: His nutmeggy cologne always reminded her of holiday baking.
meanings.sent4: The nutmeggy flavor of the cider was a delightful surprise.
meanings.sent5: The nutmeggy candles created a cozy atmosphere in the living room.
